name: Spellcasting 201: The Sorcerer's Appliance
description:
Spellcasting 201: The Sorcerer's Appliance is an adventure game developed by Legend Entertainment Company. It came out on 01-01-1991. Legend Entertainment Company published the game.
Spellcasting 201: The Sorcerer's Appliance is available on PC.
Michael J. Lindner produced the game.
